mapper.select:
/* USE : DstbCloseProdMapper.getDstbCloseProdAddProdList */
SELECT ( SELECT SF_GET_PROD_CLASSES('H', thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD, thp.PROD_CLASS_CD) FROM DUAL ) AS PROD_CLASS_NM , thp.PROD_CD , thp.PROD_NM , thp.SPLY_UPRC , thp.PO_UNIT_FG , thp.PO_UNIT_QTY
FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD thpb
, TB_HQ_VENDOR_PROD thvp
WHERE thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thp.USE_YN = 'Y' AND thp.PO_PROD_FG IN ('1', '3') AND thpb.HQ_OFFICE_CD(+)= thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpb.PROD_CD (+)= thp.PROD_CD
AND thvp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thvp.VENDR_CD = #{vendrCd} AND thvp.PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND thvp.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND thp.PROD_CD = #{prodCd}
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND thpb.BARCD_CD = #{barcdCd}
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT #{prodClassCd} AS PROD_CLASS_CD FROM DUAL UNION SELECT thpc.PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS thpc WHERE thpc.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH thpc.P_PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND thpc.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY thpc.P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR thpc.PROD_CLASS_CD AND thpc.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
ORDER BY thp.PROD_CD

/* USE : DstbCloseProdMapper.getDstbCloseProdAddProdDstbList */ SELECT COUNT(STORE_CD) FROM TB_PO_HQ_STORE_DISTRIBUTE WHERE REQ_DATE = #{reqDate} --PARAM 요청일자 AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} --PARAM 선택클릭시 매장코드 AND PROC_FG IN ('20','30') --고정 AND SLIP_FG = #{slipFg} --PARAM 주문/반품구분
